attributes.action: Increasing payout at maternity and extending the paid maternity period
attributes.additional_details: As a future mother, I would like to devote myself to a new family member without worrying about finances and I regret that I could not decide without financial pressure when my child is ready to let me go back to work.
attributes.background: I would like to ask the Government to  increase financial support for women who are on maternity but should also extend the maternity pay period, beacsue the child should be with his mother as long as possible.
